FISSPy¶

fisspy Package¶

FISSPy¶

An free and open-source Python package for NST/FISS instrument.

Links¶

Homepage : http://fiss.snu.ac.kr

Documentation : http://docs.fisspy.

Functions¶

ffmpeg(imgstr, fpsi[, output]) FFMPEG

Classes¶

cm Color Map for FISS instrument.
